name: Dicey Racers
description:
This is a submission for Weekly Game Jam 141

Theme: Good Luck

Race for glory and credits!

* Click on any dice to roll, the distance cars travel are determined by your rolls.

* Be the 1st or 2nd best racer to proceed to the next league.

* Upgrade your car to have a better chance of winning the league.

Note: Unfortunately there is no music because I was out of time, but we have a dice sound and a flux capactior upgrade! (and possibly some nasty bugs)
